/* Menu.ListMenu */
WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( SELECT MENU_ID, UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_URL, MENU_ORDER, MENU_DEPTH, CAST(MENU_ORDER AS CHAR(200)) AS SORT_ORDER, USE_YN, DELETE_YN FROM CO_MENU WHERE UP_MENU_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.UP_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_URL, A.MENU_ORDER, A.MENU_DEPTH, CONCAT(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', LPAD(A.MENU_ORDER, 5, '0')) AS SORT_ORDER, A.USE_YN, A.DELETE_YN FROM CO_MENU A INNER JOIN R ON A.UP_MENU_ID = R.MENU_ID ) SELECT R.MENU_ID, R.UP_MENU_ID, R.MENU_NAME, R.MENU_URL, R.MENU_ORDER, R.MENU_DEPTH, R.USE_YN, R.DELETE_YN FROM R WHERE R.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT MR.MENU_ID FROM CO_MENU_ROLE MR INNER JOIN CO_USER_MENU_ROLE UMR ON MR.MENU_ID = UMR.MENU_ID AND MR.ROLE_ID = UMR.ROLE_ID WHERE UMR.USER_ID = @UserId )
AND R.USE_YN = @UseYn
AND R.DELETE_YN = @DeleteYn
ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', 1) AS UNSIGNED), CASE WHEN R.SORT_ORDER LIKE '%-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END
